mata innawa prana sama mithuriyo ata denek.me aya mata muna gahune pasal adhyapanaya hamara karala usas adhyapanaya labana kale.pasal kalaye hitiya hondama mithuriyangen danatath indala hitala hari durakathana amathumak hari denne ekkenek pamanayi.anik ayage yalu kam munu pothata witharak sima wela.me kiyana mithuriyan ehema neweyi.dukata sapata hama detama eka wage inna aya.me ayage gam palath kurunagala,kaluthara, galla, gampaha, kolambaa, mahanuwara aadi lankawe wiwidha disthrikka wala.me wenakota wiwidha rakiya wala niratha wunath awashya welawakadi mona loke indan hari enna me aya pasubata wenne na.wanamali,sandamali,sapumali,madhumathi,lilani,manori,mangali,manik thamayi me aya.me ekak wath saba nam neweyi.
